database.name: VIEW M_RM_RECEIPT_PICK_EDIT
database.view: SELECT COALESCE(iol.m_inoutline_id, ol.c_orderline_id) AS m_rm_receipt_pick_edit_id, ol.ad_client_id, COALESCE(iol.ad_org_id, ol.ad_org_id) AS ad_org_id, ol.isactive, ol.created, ol.createdby, ol.updated, ol.updatedby, iol.m_inout_id, CASE WHEN iol.m_inoutline_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ob_selected, ol.c_orderline_id, ol.m_product_id, ol.c_uom_id, ol.m_attributesetinstance_id, (-1) * ol.qtyordered AS returned, (-1) * (ol.qtyordered - ol.qtydelivered - COALESCE(ol.qtyrejected, 0)) AS pendingqty, (-1) * iol.movementqty AS receivingqty, iol.conditiongoods, iol.m_locator_id FROM c_orderline ol JOIN c_order o ON o.c_order_id = ol.c_order_id JOIN m_product p ON ol.m_product_id = p.m_product_id AND p.producttype = 'I' JOIN c_doctype dt ON dt.c_doctype_id = o.c_doctypetarget_id AND dt.isreturn = 'Y' LEFT JOIN (SELECT il2.* FROM m_inoutline il2 JOIN m_inout i2 ON il2.m_inout_id = i2.m_inout_id AND i2.processed='N') iol ON iol.c_orderline_id = ol.c_orderline_id LEFT JOIN m_inout io ON io.m_inout_id = iol.m_inout_id AND io.processed = 'N' WHERE (ol.qtyordered - ol.qtydelivered - COALESCE(ol.qtyrejected, 0)) <> 0
